item.description:
6:00 PM - meet the author, snacks and beverages

7:00 PM - Presentation

In the ten years since 9/11, a grassroots truth movement has sprung up that unites the best elements of the Right and Left. The call to resist the secrecy, imperialism, and the manipulation of the elite has been heard by a wide spectrum of people, across religious and political lines. Here is a fertile ground for serious change.

The call to truth and peace is a call being heard by a massive resistance in North Africa right now. We here in the USA have suffered from tyranny, secrecy and a growing police state. It’s time for the people of the USA to join the new global revolution.

Sander Hicks is an activist and a writer, working on his new book, “Slingshot to the Juggernaut.” (Soft Skull, Fall, 2012). He is the founder of the Truth Party. The time has come to unveil the future.

What Will Happen:

Sander Hicks will discuss his 10 years of direct action against the 9/11 cover-up: his confrontations with FBI, Giuliani, Spitzer, and Cheney. He will report on his investigations into the death of 9/11 whistle-blower Dr. David Graham, and the cover-up of Operation Able Danger.


Sander Hicks will present never-before-seen video evidence created by the murdered 9/11 whistle-blower Dr. David M. Graham. Watch Graham use a hidden camera to interact with well-connected 9/11 “terrorist” handlers, proving that he did meet two key 9/11 patsies. Also, Hicks will show his video interview with Lt. Col. Anthony Shaffer of the Able Danger operation, the Pentagon’s own intelligence wing that was stopped from investigating certain well-connected “Al Qaeda terrorists.”

Hicks will lead a discussion about the formation of “The Truth Party.” The Truth Party is all about nonviolence as the new US foreign policy, true government transparency, an empowering economics, public interest venture capital, and a return to a USA based on the Bill of Rights. We will end the evening with a democratic appointment of local Truth Party representatives, in your area. A quick floor vote from all attendees will create a local Truth Party presence, in your town.

9/11 Truth is not some self-referential conspiracy club. It’s a springboard to a global revolution of peace and truth.

Will you join us for this crucial conversation?

Slingshot Announcement Tour

Schedule edit forthcoming soon!

MORE INFO: call or text 347 446 4461 to talk to Sander

More info on Sander's site: http://sanderhicks.tumblr.com/post/3098995587/slingshot-announcement-tour

==============================

Please RSVP for this event, so we can determine how big a room to get for Sanders' talk.

Travel around the country for a tour like this isn't free, so please donate generously to help finance Sanders' travels. He will have books and T-shirts for sale also. We who are staying put working should support our champions who are working hard out there to get the message out.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the meeting room in the back - bring a snack - we'll have coffee and tea.
item.why: Sander Hicks has been a long-time 9/11 Truth activist/investigator/author/organizer/speaker and he's touring the country to promote his new book and party. This will be well worth hearing about - a kind of new direction for the movement.
item.name: Sander Hicks' "Slingshot to the Juggernaut" tour
